data.taskTitle: detect and show badge for CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md
detect and show badge for CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md
data.approach: 1. Add hasClaudeMd detection to project stats in API. 2. Display badge in projects page UI alongside other badges (Beads, agents, tasks, Server). 3. Check for CLAUDE.md or AGENTS.md in project root.

data.taskTitle: detect and show badge for CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md
summary: Added hasClaudeMd field to project stats API
Added CLAUDE.md badge to projects page UI with secondary color styling
Badge shows filled document icon when CLAUDE.md or AGENTS.md exists
Badge shows empty document icon when neither file exists
Tooltip shows which file type was detected
reviewFocus: Verify badge appears correctly in UI
Check badge styling matches existing badges

data.taskTitle: detect and show badge for CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md
summary: Added hasClaudeMd field to project stats API (checks for CLAUDE.md or AGENTS.md)
Added error outline badge showing No CLAUDE.md when file is missing
Badge appears next to No Beads warning in project header row
Uses badge-error badge-outline styling (red outline) for visual consistency with error states
Tooltip explains that either CLAUDE.md or AGENTS.md is expected
reviewFocus: Verify badge appears correctly in header next to No Beads
Check error outline styling is visible

data.taskTitle: detect and show badge for CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md
summary: Added hasClaudeMd field to project stats API
Added CLAUDE.md status badge in badges row (green checkmark when present, ghost X when missing)
Added No CLAUDE.md warning badge in header (red outline, next to No Beads warning)
Both indicators work together - status shows current state, warning highlights missing files
reviewFocus: Check green checkmark shows for projects with CLAUDE.md
Check red outline warning shows for projects missing CLAUDE.md

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md Detection Logic
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests to validate file detection mechanism. Tests should cover scenarios of file presence, absence, and edge cases in different project structures. Implement tests in the project's testing framework to ensure robust file detection functionality.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure reliability of new file detection feature

suggestedTasks.title: Document CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md File Detection Process
suggestedTasks.description: Create documentation explaining the purpose and implementation of the CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md detection feature. Include details on how projects can leverage this functionality, what these files represent, and how the badge system works.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve team understanding of new project documentation feature

documentationNeeds: Update project README with new detection feature
